name: Tabulous
description: Clean up your tabs with Tabulous. Choose the ones you want to keep, and let Tabulous close the rest!
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 chrome-extension://lmhkpmbekcpmknklioeibfkpmmfibljd 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src * 'self' data:; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com
